channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hilton's crown jewel resort just leveled up: Here's what's new at the Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal
item.description: Here's a look at what was renovated, what beloved features stayed the same and how you can experience it for yourself.

item.title: Chase credit cards: Best time to apply based on offer history
item.description: Credit card welcome bonus offers can change quickly and over time. Here's what to know about Chase's bonuses so you can know when to apply.

item.title: Do hotel stays on Dec. 31 count toward earning status for this year or next?
item.description: Booking a hotel night over New Year's Eve as a last push for elite status qualification can be a risky. Will your stay count toward status this year o...

item.title: Your complete guide to shopping protections on American Express cards
item.description: This is the complete guide to the many shopping protections provided on American Express cards. Plus, learn which cards offer which benefits to maximi...

item.title: The 12 best secret beaches in the Caribbean
item.description: Here are 12 of the best beaches in the Caribbean that still fly under most travelers' radar, from Curacao to St. John.
